tags.name: pdf-element
tags.description:
Polymer element which renders PDF documents. It uses [PDF.js](https://mozilla.github.io/pdf.js/) library behind.

Example:

Minimum configuration:
```html
<pdf-element src="../example.pdf" width=800 height=600></pdf-element>
```
Optionally following parameters could be triggered:
- `elevation` material elevation;
- `downloadable` to be able to download document;
- `show-file-name` to show name of the file in the PDF toolbar.


```html
<pdf-element src="../example.pdf" elevation="5" downloadable show-file-name width=800 height=600></pdf-element>
```

Another awesome feature is dynamically load PDF file. So you can change the `src` attribute of the element and document will be automatically reloaded (checkout the demo):

```html
<pdf-element src="[[pdfFile]]" width=800 height=600></pdf-element>
```

Attributes:

  * `src` {`string`} - Source of a PDF file.

  * `elevation` {`number`} - The z-depth of this element, from 0-5. Setting to 0 will remove the shadow, and each increasing number greater than 0 will be "deeper" than the last.

  * `downloadable` {`boolean`} - If provided then download icon will appear on the toolbar to download file.

  * `show-file-name` {`boolean`} - If provided then file name will be shown on the toolbar.

  * `show-spinner` {`boolean`} - If provided then during page rendering loading spinner will be shown.
Maybe used for documents with many images for example.

  * `enable-text-selection` {`boolean`} - If provided then text selection will be enabled.

  * `fit-width` {`boolean`} - If provided then the document will be zoomed to maximum width initially.

  * `width` {`number`} - If provided then the width will be set.

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Properties:

  * `src` {`string`} - Source of a PDF file.

  * `elevation` {`number`} - The z-depth of this element, from 0-5. Setting to 0 will remove the shadow, and each increasing number greater than 0 will be "deeper" than the last.

  * `downloadable` {`boolean`} - If provided then download icon will appear on the toolbar to download file.

  * `showFileName` {`boolean`} - If provided then file name will be shown on the toolbar.

  * `showSpinner` {`boolean`} - If provided then during page rendering loading spinner will be shown.
Maybe used for documents with many images for example.

  * `enableTextSelection` {`boolean`} - If provided then text selection will be enabled.

  * `fitWidth` {`boolean`} - If provided then the document will be zoomed to maximum width initially.

  * `width` {`number`} - If provided then the width will be set.

  * `schemaResourceID` {`string`} - 

  * `schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

  * `_template` {`HTMLTemplateElement | null`} - 

  * `_importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `rootPath` {`string`} - 

  * `importPath` {`string`} - 

  * `root` {`HTMLElement | ShadowRoot | StampedTemplate | null`} - 

  * `$` - 

  * `_overrideLegacyUndefined` {`boolean`} - 

  * `PROPERTY_EFFECT_TYPES` -

attributes.description:
`src` {`string`} - Source of a PDF file.

Property: src

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description:
`elevation` {`number`} - The z-depth of this element, from 0-5. Setting to 0 will remove the shadow, and each increasing number greater than 0 will be "deeper" than the last.

Property: elevation

Default: 1

attributes.name: downloadable
attributes.description:
`downloadable` {`boolean`} - If provided then download icon will appear on the toolbar to download file.

Property: downloadable

Default: false

attributes.name: show-file-name
attributes.description:
`show-file-name` {`boolean`} - If provided then file name will be shown on the toolbar.

Property: showFileName

Default: false

attributes.description:
`show-spinner` {`boolean`} - If provided then during page rendering loading spinner will be shown.
Maybe used for documents with many images for example.

Property: showSpinner

Default: false

attributes.description:
`enable-text-selection` {`boolean`} - If provided then text selection will be enabled.

Property: enableTextSelection

Default: false

attributes.name: fit-width
attributes.description:
`fit-width` {`boolean`} - If provided then the document will be zoomed to maximum width initially.

Property: fitWidth

Default: false

attributes.name: width
attributes.description:
`width` {`number`} - If provided then the width will be set.

Property: width

Default: 500

attributes.name: schemaMap
attributes.description:
`schemaMap` - Schema Map for the element, used to generate a valid prefix on the fly
Props set for Polymer compatibility

Property: schemaMap

Default: [object Object]
